author: jochembrouwer
content:
Hey all, some small questions regarding 7702. 

I am currently implementing the latest spec and am aware of the many open PRs in the EIP repo. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/62419ca3f45375db00b04a368ea37c0bfb05386a/EIPS/eip-7702.md

1. ~~What are the semantics if the nonce array has more than one nonce? Is this allowed?~~ is in the EIP, it is invalid
2. I think the authorization list needs some extra validation, i.e. the address is 20 bytes, and the other values in the authorization list cannot exceed the max integer (otherwise this allows for arbitrary large nonces for instance)
3. Why is the `address` which we add not added to the warm addresses? We need to read the code from this account, so it should be warm
4. The gas costs do not charge to make `address` warm. Also, is the current 2500 `PER_CONTRACT_CODE_BASE_COST` does this also cover reading the `authority` address to make it warm?
5. EIP-1559 is not in the required EIPs

author: jochembrouwer
content: Ah and another question, what about flipping signatures? I.e. do we want this check? `Invalid Signature: s-values greater than secp256k1n/2 are considered invalid`
